channel.title: OutWar SCAR script
channel.description:
Hey,
Yes it's a OutWar request again by me ;). I'm hoping someone could aid me by cheating @ OutWar with a SCAR script.
I think it should be very easy to do with SCAR.
What I would need: -A script that auto trains for me ( I could supply a list with all the mobs, and in which room they're located) -A script that moves accounts to a certain room for me -A script that could 'raid' for me
Now they made a update which makes cheating very easy now, since you don't got to double click on a word anymore to perform a action.
You can also navigate trough OW by using the W, A, S and D keys.
Ofcourse I'll pay for it when it's hard to make. I can also supply you with a account to test everything.
Hope to hear from anyone soon :).

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Aftermath:

Well, don’t go suggesting memory editors if you don’t know the target game

Well i just played it and it is shit. I think it’s worse then WebKinz (Even though i haven’t played it :p).

Read full topic

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Aftermath:

The whole game is serverside. What’s the point in memory-editing a web-page in your browser?

Well how am i supposed yo know. I don’t even know what the website is :p. Heck, i haven’t even played this game or ever heard of it.

Read full topic

The whole game is serverside. What’s the point in memory-editing a web-page in your browser?

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

I’ll do it for you. But since you say it is so easy to cheat in that game now, why don’t you use Cheat Engine unless the game is serverside. This program could hack any Flash, Java, Executable based game and change the score forever unless the game is serverside. If it is client side then the changes will be permanent!

In you next post, please provide as much detail to where the mobs in OW are located.
And there is only one payment i am accepting. ONLY one.

Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

exps35:

I would give it a try, but it seems like alot of work finding all the mobs and how to get all the way to the room they are located in. You would have to script out walking paths for the entire outwar world map (I think).

I forgot to mention that I could supply the ‘scripter’ with a list of every mob in OW and were they’re located.

@Aftermath:

Well I don’t know whats better tbh, I think SCAR would be better and less detectable (not that they care).

If you (or anyone else) wants to help, got suggestions please tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I used Coron’s programs, I still have them. It’d be a lot more practical to make a Java program rather than a SCAR script, though.

Read full topic

item.title: OutWar SCAR script
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:4, topic:122362”]I remember when you wanted to make a bot for this game
I still have a bot that led Outwar cheating for a while, then got a few thousand people banned. I think he stopped making the updates though… I haven’t tried it in a year.[/quote]

DCAA by Shadowlord :).

Well, cheating at this game should be very easy, SCAR is much eachier to use for this than writing a ‘bot’ I guess.

Thats why I’m requesting a SCAR script, but it looks like that we got no active SCAR scripters left, that or none wants to help me :P.

Read full topic
